parameters.formDescription: Enter the URL for a YouTube video and you will receive a Summary of its content.

values.combineMapPrompt:
=Write a concise summary of the following:


"{{ $json.transcript }}"


CONCISE SUMMARY:
values.prompt:
=Write a concise summary of the following:


"{{ $json.transcript }}"


CONCISE SUMMARY:

values.content:
=Here is the transcript that needs to be rewritten into an article:

{{ $('Get Document').item.json.content }}

parameters.jsonBody:
={
    "dateFilter": "year",
    "downloadSubtitles": false,
    "hasCC": false,
    "hasLocation": false,
    "hasSubtitles": false,
    "is360": false,
    "is3D": false,
    "is4K": false,
    "isBought": false,
    "isHD": false,
    "isHDR": false,
    "isLive": false,
    "isVR180": false,
    "maxResultStreams": 0,
    "maxResults": 200,
    "maxResultsShorts": 0,
    "oldestPostDate": "2024-01-01",
    "preferAutoGeneratedSubtitles": false,
    "saveSubsToKVS": false,
    "startUrls": [
        {
            "url": "{{ $json.URL }}",
            "method": "POST"
        }
    ],
    "subtitlesLanguage": "en"
}

parameters.content:
## Comments Sentiment Analysis















## Score Ranges:
-100 to +100 possible range
Above 0: Generally positive sentiment
Above 30: Considered good
Above 50: Excellent
Above 70: Exceptional/Industry leading

## Interpretation Guidelines:
Below -20: Critical issues need addressing
-20 to 0: Room for significant improvement
0 to 30: Average/Acceptable
30 to 50: Strong positive sentiment
50+: Outstanding sentiment

parameters.html:
{{ $('Youtube Transcript').first().json.videoTitle }}

Summary

{{ $('Summary Agent').first().json.text }}

Video Information

  • Channel: {{ $('Read_Videos').first().json.Channelname }}
  • Link: {{ $('Read_Videos').first().json.Video_Url }}
  • Published: {{ $now.format('yyyy-MMM-dd') }}
  • Duration: {{ $('Read_Videos').first().json.Duration}}
  • Views: {{ $('Read_Videos').first().json.Viewcount }}
  • Likes: {{ $('Read_Videos').first().json.Likes }}

Comment Sentiment Analysis

  • sNPS: {{ $('Sentiment Stats').item.json.snps }} %
  • Positive: {{ $('Positive').first().json.count_sentimentAnalysis }}
  • Neutral: {{ $('Neutral').first().json.count_sentimentAnalysis }}
  • Negative: {{ $('Negative').first().json.count_sentimentAnalysis }}
